name: CreateNewTeam
description:
Create a new team and add specified members.

This tool creates a new team and adds specified user IDs to it. Use it when you need to establish a team and assign users to it in Datadog.

parameters.name: team_creation_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing team attributes (name, handle, description, avatar, banner) and relationships (user IDs to be added).

avatar.description: Unicode representation of the avatar for the team, limited to a single grapheme

description.description: Free-form markdown description/content for the team's homepage

hidden_modules.description: Collection of hidden modules for the team

visible_modules.description: Collection of visible modules for the team

id.description: A unique identifier that represents the user.

relationships.description: Relationships formed with the team on creation

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.
